Uses of Interface
xyz.morphia.Datastore

  • Packages that use Datastore 
    Package Description
    xyz.morphia
    This is the base package for all Morphia classes.
    xyz.morphia.aggregation
    Defines various elements for the creation and processing of aggregation pipelines.
    xyz.morphia.mapping
    Provides types used for mapping
    xyz.morphia.mapping.codec
    Provides various codec support classes
    xyz.morphia.mapping.experimental
    Provides experimental mapping classes.
    xyz.morphia.query
    Defines the query capabilities for Morphia

    • Uses of Datastore in xyz.morphia

      Subinterfaces of Datastore in xyz.morphia 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AdvancedDatastore
      This interface exposes advanced Datastore features, like interacting with Document and low-level options.
      Methods in xyz.morphia that return Datastore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Datastore Morphia.createDatastore(com.mongodb.MongoClient mongoClient, String dbName)
      It is best to use a Mongo singleton instance here.
      static Datastore Morphia.createDatastore(String dbName)
      Creates a Datastore
